description: Modifies the settings for a set of cluster snapshots.

parameters.name: SnapshotIdentifierList
parameters.description: A list of snapshot identifiers you want to modify. (string) ---

parameters.name: ManualSnapshotRetentionPeriod
parameters.description: The number of days that a manual snapshot is retained. If you specify the value -1, the manual snapshot is retained indefinitely. The number must be either -1 or an integer between 1 and 3,653. If you decrease the manual snapshot retention period from its current value, existing manual snapshots that fall outside of the new retention period will return an error. If you want to suppress the errors and delete the snapshots, use the force option.

nested_items.name: Resources
nested_items.description: A list of the snapshots that were modified.

nested_items.name: Errors
nested_items.description: A list of any errors returned.

nested_items.name: SnapshotIdentifier
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the snapshot returning the error.

nested_items.name: SnapshotClusterIdentifier
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the cluster.

nested_items.name: FailureCode
nested_items.description: The failure code for the error.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: The text message describing the error.
